meaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> falls into the <radical>dirt</radical> when a <radical>pig</radical> with <radical>horns</radical> <kanji>crash</kanji>es into it. The building literally crashes to the ground when the horned pig attacks it.
readingMnemonic: You pull the poor pig out of the rubble of the <kanji>crash</kanji>. It's not dead, but it had a nasty bump to the head and now thinks it's a bird. "<reading>TWEE</reading>T (つい)!" says the pig. "Tweet, tweet, tweet!" Poor confused pig.
